name: repurify
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make something pure again, usually by removing unwanted substances from it: These companies are literally repurifying clean water and selling it to us in plastic packaging. A chemist will use the product to distill and repurify solvents.
More examplesFewer examplesThe blood samples were repurified and their quality was examined.The technology is now used to desalinate and repurify groundwater.The ceremonial event involved a ritual hunt and a sacrifice, ceremonies that the people believed would repurify the earth.
